SEARCH
Package com.eventlog.sdk.util

Class EventLogUtils

java.lang.Object
com.eventlog.sdk.util.EventLogUtils
public final class EventLogUtils extends Object
Utility class for Event Log SDK operations

Provides helper methods for generating IDs and creating typed events following the Event Log API v1.4 schema conventions.

  • Method Details

    • createCorrelationId

      public static String createCorrelationId()
      Generate a correlation ID with the default prefix
      Returns:
      A unique correlation ID in format "corr-{timestamp}-{random}"

    • createCorrelationId

      public static String createCorrelationId(String prefix)
      Generate a correlation ID with a custom prefix
      Parameters:
      prefix - The prefix for the correlation ID (e.g., "orig", "auth", "emp")
      Returns:
      A unique correlation ID in format "{prefix}-{timestamp}-{random}"

    • createBatchId

      public static String createBatchId(String source)
      Generate a batch ID for grouping multiple process instances
      Parameters:
      source - The source identifier (e.g., "hr-upload", "csv-import")
      Returns:
      A unique batch ID in format "batch-{YYYYMMDD}-{source}-{random}"

    • createTraceId

      public static String createTraceId()
      Generate a W3C-compliant trace ID (32 hex characters)
      Returns:
      A random trace ID suitable for distributed tracing

    • createSpanId

      public static String createSpanId()
      Generate a span ID (16 hex characters)
      Returns:
      A random span ID

    • processStart

      public static EventLogEntry.Builder processStart(String correlationId, String traceId, String processName)
      Create a PROCESS_START event builder with required fields pre-set
      Parameters:
      correlationId - Process-level anchor ID
      traceId - Request-level trace ID
      processName - Business process name
      Returns:
      Builder with PROCESS_START defaults (step_sequence=0, status=IN_PROGRESS)

    • step

      public static EventLogEntry.Builder step(String correlationId, String traceId, String processName, int stepSequence, String stepName)
      Create a STEP event builder with required fields pre-set
      Parameters:
      correlationId - Process-level anchor ID
      traceId - Request-level trace ID
      processName - Business process name
      stepSequence - Step number in the process
      stepName - Human-readable step name
      Returns:
      Builder with STEP defaults

    • processEnd

      public static EventLogEntry.Builder processEnd(String correlationId, String traceId, String processName, int stepSequence, EventStatus status, int totalDurationMs)
      Create a PROCESS_END event builder with required fields pre-set
      Parameters:
      correlationId - Process-level anchor ID
      traceId - Request-level trace ID
      processName - Business process name
      stepSequence - Final step number
      status - SUCCESS or FAILURE
      totalDurationMs - Total process execution time
      Returns:
      Builder with PROCESS_END defaults

    • error

      public static EventLogEntry.Builder error(String correlationId, String traceId, String processName, String errorCode, String errorMessage)
      Create an ERROR event builder with required fields pre-set
      Parameters:
      correlationId - Process-level anchor ID
      traceId - Request-level trace ID
      processName - Business process name
      errorCode - Standardized error code
      errorMessage - Error details
      Returns:
      Builder with ERROR defaults (status=FAILURE)

    • generateSummary

      public static String generateSummary(String action, String target, String outcome)
      Generate a well-formed summary string following schema guidelines
      Parameters:
      action - The action performed (e.g., "Validated authorized user")
      target - The target of the action (e.g., "Jane Doe (SSN ***5678)")
      outcome - The result (e.g., "identity confirmed")
      Returns:
      Formatted summary string

    • generateSummary

      public static String generateSummary(String action, String target, String outcome, String details)
      Generate a well-formed summary string with optional details
      Parameters:
      action - The action performed
      target - The target of the action (nullable)
      outcome - The result
      details - Additional details (nullable)
      Returns:
      Formatted summary string

    • maskLast4

      public static String maskLast4(String value)
      Mask a sensitive value, showing only last 4 characters
      Parameters:
      value - The value to mask
      Returns:
      Masked string (e.g., "***1234")
